Class SldCombatZone

java.lang.Object
org.mio.progettoingsoft.advCards.sealed.SldAdvCard
org.mio.progettoingsoft.advCards.sealed.SldCombatZone
public final class SldCombatZone extends SldAdvCard
Represents a "Combat Zone" adventure card in the game. This card type involves various combat-related interactions, including engine power checks, firing drills, and cannon penalties, leading to potential crew loss or component destruction. It extends SldAdvCard and provides specific implementations for its combat-related effects and data handling.

  • Constructor Details

    • SldCombatZone

      public SldCombatZone(int id, int level, List<CombatLine> lines)
      Constructs a new SldCombatZone card.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier for the card.
      level - The difficulty level of the card.
      lines - A list of CombatLine defining the combat scenarios and outcomes.

  • Method Details

    • getFirePower

      public Map<Player,Double> getFirePower()
      Retrieves the reported fire power of players during a combat phase.
      Returns:
      A map where keys are Player objects and values are their reported fire power.

    • getEnginePower

      public Map<Player,Integer> getEnginePower()
      Retrieves the reported engine power of players during a combat phase.
      Returns:
      A map where keys are Player objects and values are their reported engine power.

    • getActualCannon

      public CannonPenalty getActualCannon()
      Retrieves the current cannon penalty being processed.
      Returns:
      The CannonPenalty currently active.

    • getLines

      public List<CombatLine> getLines()
      Overrides the base method to return the specific combat lines for this card.
      Overrides:
      getLines in class SldAdvCard
      Returns:
      A list of CombatLine objects associated with this Combat Zone.

    • getCardName

      public String getCardName()
      Overrides the base method to return the name of this card.
      Specified by:
      getCardName in class SldAdvCard
      Returns:
      The string "Combat Zone".

    • getCrewLost

      public int getCrewLost()
      Overrides the base method to return the number of crew lost specific to certain Combat Zone cards. For card ID 16, 2 crew members are lost. Otherwise, no crew are lost by default.
      Overrides:
      getCrewLost in class SldAdvCard
      Returns:
      The number of crew members lost.

    • getCannonPenalty

      public List<CannonPenalty> getCannonPenalty()
      Overrides the base method to return the specific cannon penalties for certain Combat Zone cards. Returns predefined penalties for card IDs 16 and 35.
      Overrides:
      getCannonPenalty in class SldAdvCard
      Returns:
      A list of CannonPenalty objects.

    • loadCombatZone

      public static SldCombatZone loadCombatZone(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode node)
      Static factory method to load an SldCombatZone object from a JSON node. It parses the node to extract ID, level, and combat lines, including complex penalty structures like cannon penalties.
      Parameters:
      node - The JsonNode containing the Combat Zone card data.
      Returns:
      A new SldCombatZone instance populated with data from the JSON node.

    • init

      public void init(GameServer game)
      Initializes the Combat Zone card's state and context within the game. Sets up the game, fly board, allowed players, and initializes iterators for player interactions based on the specific card ID (e.g., ID 16 for crew loss, ID 36 for fire drills).
      Specified by:
      init in class SldAdvCard
      Parameters:
      game - The GameServer instance managing the current game.

    • setNextPlayerEngine

      public void setNextPlayerEngine()
      Sets the next player for the engine power choice phase or proceeds to calculate the lowest engine power and applies effects based on the card ID. This method transitions the card state to ENGINE_CHOICE or subsequent states.

    • setNextPlayerFire

      public void setNextPlayerFire()
      Sets the next player for the fire drill choice phase or proceeds to calculate the lowest fire power and applies effects based on the card ID. This method transitions the card state to DRILL_CHOICE or subsequent states.

    • setNextCannon

      public void setNextCannon()
      Sets the next cannon penalty to be applied or finalizes the card's effect if no more penalties. This method transitions the card state to DICE_ROLL or FINALIZED.

    • setNextCannon

      public void setNextCannon(String nickname, boolean destroyed, boolean energy)
      Applies the result of a cannon penalty, potentially removing energy or destroying a ship component. After applying the penalty, it proceeds to the next cannon penalty.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player affected by the penalty.
      destroyed - A boolean indicating if a component was destroyed.
      energy - A boolean indicating if energy was removed.

    • setEnginePower

      public void setEnginePower(Player player, int power)
      Stores the engine power chosen by a specific player.
      Parameters:
      player - The Player who made the choice.
      power - The integer value of the engine power chosen.

    • setDrills

      public void setDrills(Player player, List<Cordinate> drillsCord)
      Calculates and stores the fire power for a player based on their ship's drills and base power. After calculating, it proceeds to the next player for fire drill choice.
      Parameters:
      player - The Player who performed the drill.
      drillsCord - A list of Cordinate representing the drills used.

    • removeCrew

      public void removeCrew(String nickname, List<Cordinate> cordinates)
      Handles the removal of crew members from a player's ship. This method is typically called when a player needs to remove crew due to a penalty. It updates the ship's state and logs the event.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player from whom crew is to be removed.
      cordinates - A list of Cordinate representing the components from which crew is removed.
      Throws:
      IncorrectFlyBoardException - if the provided nickname does not match the actual player.
